list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a chess piece of the smallest size and value. A pawn moves one square forward along its file if unobstructed (or two on the first move), or one square diagonally forward when making a capture. Each player begins with eight pawns on the second rank, and can promote a pawn to become any other piece (typically a queen) if it reaches the opponent's end of the board.
an object left as security for money lent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bank did lend money upon pawns at low interest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngân hàng đã cho vay tiền khi cầm đồ với lãi suất thấp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: deposit (an object) with a pawnbroker as security for money lent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I pawned the necklace to cover the loan
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi cầm đồ vòng cổ để trả cho khoản vay
